scripts.debug: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run generate && npm run dev
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run server:prod
scripts.generate: npm r vue-verovio-canvas && rm -rf node_modules/.vite && npm i github:WolfgangDrescher/vue-verovio-canvas && rm -rf dist/ && vite build && vite build --ssr && vite-plugin-ssr prerender && npm r vue-verovio-canvas && rm -rf node_modules/.vite && npm i ../../vue-verovio-canvas
scripts.deploy: npm run generate && rsync -azP dist/client/ wolfgang:lassus.wolfgangdrescher.ch --delete
